| No panorama is recorded when the shutter button is pressed. | The indicator lamp was orange when you attempted to record a panorama: Wait until the indicator lamp turns off (ðŸ“– 7).                                           |
| No face is detected.                   | - The subjectâ€™s face is obscured by sunglasses, a hat, long hair, or other objects: Remove the obstructions (ðŸ“– 132).                                           |
|                                        | - The subjectâ€™s face occupies only a small area of the frame: Change the composition so that the subjectâ€™s face occupies a larger area of the frame (ðŸ“– 132).  |
|                                        | - The subjectâ€™s face is turned away from the camera: Ask the subject to face the camera (ðŸ“– 132).                                                               |
|                                        | - The camera is tilted: Keep the camera level.                                                                                                                 |
|                                        | - The subjectâ€™s face is poorly lit: Shoot in bright light.                                                                                                     |
| The flash does not fire.               | - The flash is disabled: Adjust settings (ðŸ“– 149).                                                                                                             |
|                                        | - The battery is exhausted: Charge the battery or insert a fully-charged spare battery (ðŸ“– 33).                                                                |
|                                        | - The camera is in bracketing or continuous mode: Select single frame mode (ðŸ“– 5).                                                                             |
| Some flash modes are not available.    | OFF is selected for SOUND & FLASH: Select ON (ðŸ“– 211).                                                                                                         |
| The flash does not fully light the subject. | - The subject is not in range of the flash: Position the subject in range of the flash.                                                                        |
|                                        | - The flash window is obstructed: Hold the camera correctly.                                                                                                   |
|                                        | - Shutter speed is faster than the sync speed: Choose a slower shutter speed (ðŸ“– 59, 65, 331).                                                                 |
| Pictures are blurred.                  | - The lens is dirty: Clean the lens.                                                                                                                           |
|                                        | - The lens is blocked: Keep objects away from the lens (ðŸ“– 43).                                                                                                |
|                                        | - !AF is displayed during shooting and the focus frame is displayed in red: Check focus before shooting (ðŸ“– 44).                                               |
